item.title: DMML Tools Trend & Relationship 2016
item.description: This is a summary of KD-nuggets blogs: here and here. Pictures are modified for my own notes. Tools Associations # ![](./_image/2016-06-17 18-27-03.jpg) sunny’s conclusion # Possible framework 1: Hadoop + Spark + Python + scikit. Possible framework 2: SQL+ Excel + Tableau. Try NOT use: RapidMiner, KNIME (whatever situation). Big Data Related Tools # ![](./_image/2016-06-17 18-40-16.jpg) Deep Learning Related Tools # ![](./_image/2016-06-17 18-42-52.jpg) Big_Data- / Deep_Learning-Related Tools # ![](./_image/2016-06-17 18-47-05.jpg)
